The Peace Corps ICT4D Playbook

Principles, projects, and resource toolkits for Peace Corps Volunteers on using data and technology in their service.

ICT4D Guide

This guide discusses the use of information and communication technologies for development (ICT4D) at Peace Corps.

Start Reading

The mission, vision, objectives, and goals for the initiative.

ICT4D Principles

A set of guidelines for thinking through ICT4D projects.

The Principles

Community

Online communities and Volunteer committees working in ICT4D globally.

Connect

Volunteer Projects

Projects, use cases, stories and case studies highlighting the impact and efforts of various applications of ICT4D in the field.

Volunteer Projects

Resource Toolkits

A curated collection of ICT4D resources including articles, relevant blogs and blog posts, how to guides, presentations and videos, and organizations working in this.

Resource Toolkits
